channel.title: Auto set DirectX 718
channel.description:
Okay so I'm using a source which doesn't allow you to use a different client to it's self which is bringing up an error on Class52? I don't understand why that's only on other computers apart from mine. But I tried using other clients that didn't connect and the Jar doesn't set it to DirectX causing lag for people. Is there anyway to fix this?
I put it in Server Help as didn't know if source or client?
Thanks

item.title: Auto set DirectX 718
